attributes.additional_details:
We should immediately
a) Add a £1000 tax on all planes, boats, vehicles from Spain to ANY UK port - including Gibraltar
b) Ban all Spanish imports - including fruit and vegetables, cars, and anything else.
c) Ban all Spanish from visiting UK or UK territory (such as Gibraltar
d) Immediate repossession of any Spanish owned property in Gibraltar with no compensation.

All of this to remain in place until Spain formally drops its claim to our land and lifts all border controls entirely.

Of course, since Cameron and the previous idiots (since 1950) have denuded our armed forced - destroyed our airforce, removed all ships from the navy, destroyed the navies ability to provide carrier support, and cut troop numbers to the point they couldn't defend either the Isle of White or Gibraltar we have to hope the Spanish don't just walk across the border don't we?
